Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2007 04:44PM nurseekp wrote: I have been reading everyones posts-I am going for stereotactic biopsy tomorrow-made me wait 3 weeks and the waiting is awful!! Just torture. I am trying to tell myself 80% are benign. My 2 sisters just very recently had similar scares. My sister in Calif thought she had it in Dec but turned out to be a cyst. My sister in Australia was diagnosed with atypical ductal hyperplasia. How long has everyone had to wait for results???
Posts.Title: Mammo and US different results carandkensmom nurseekp
